content:
Yes It's a good hotel very nice and cosy.
Staff, room, sevice are all good. they are benevolent and accommodating too.
I am happy and satisfied in your hotel
By the way, I requested Airport serviced sending me 4 times(Emai confirm, before day check out, Checkout time, and when I leaved)

BUT they are forgot!!!
Fortunately your staff helped me, so I could take a plane on time.
I was disappointed in that time.

I think hotel working take over the problem or your staffs ignored me.

and I send a email to your hotel before 5days ago
(For to confirmed me if my earphone I left in my room and I requesting to take a picture of your staff and please send it to me. besides your staff promised send it)

BUT until now they didn't response or reply my email. Hope and I expect some reply from you.

title: Affordable hotelβ€
content:
Its located in the center of BKK1 thus one of most convenient to use bunch of restaurants within walking distance.
Hotel is clear and all the staffs always smiling and warm greeting.
Hidden tip is that the agoda price was lower than company rate^^

title: Hotel where you stay at least one night when you visit Phnom Penhβ€
content: I've visited many other hotels in Phnom Penh, but it's a hotel with a very satisfying cost-effectiveness. The Wi-Fi is not slow and the hot water is good, so my son always tells me to go. Breakfast buffet types are normal, but you can apply for rice noodles and fried eggs for free.

hotel_name: RiverTree Villa & Resort
title: Remote location, clean roomβ€
content:
We were satisfied with services in the resort but only its location. It is difficukt to get there if you follow the google map. Just get to the Kampot town and then go to the resort, it is better and saving time even little farther in its distance. 
Able to enjoy free kayaking as well although not long.

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Gone downhillβ€
content:
The property itself needs a proper renovation, serious mold and leaks in the rooms (I stayed in the riverside and their priciest room). Water pooled in the room from rain, very bad mold in room and shower, hardly any water pressure in shower.


Something they can't be blamed for,but also don't warn you about, is there is terribly loud music along the riverside (wasn't there previously) that blares until midnight each night.

The toilet didn't seem to get rid of whatever you flushed and the water was constantly yellow. 

The staff were extremely friendly to be fair so if you got a better room it may well be a much better experience.

I extended my stay!  If I go to kampot again, I will absolutely book again!

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Wonderful guest house on the river side.β€
content:
Beautiful place here. The Staff all seem very honest and friendly. The rooms are big clean and the Air con works great. There is a laid back bar upstairs with a pool table and social atmosphere. Restrant does good breakfast. There is also a food place either side and an rustic boat bar oppsite and a sunset dinner boat tour next to that.
It is Walking distance from the high street. Its a great place.  Each evening you can watch the sunset from the roof top bar or the 2nd floor smoking area balcony.
Both over look the large river with mountains in the background.
AKA very nice view.
I booked a tour to the top of the mountain with reception and there was a free pick up.
I recomend

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)

WIFI speed test says 20 meg download?!
Lovely staff

content: Big clean room with comfortable bed, great view, and AC that really worked. Food was great and rooftop lounge was accessible all day (even when bar wasn't open) and a great place to enjoy my coffee and read and watch the city in the morning.

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)

I've only had breakfast, good variety, great fruit, yogourt & muslin.   Wi-fi works well in central and front rooms but that's with my Ipad which is sometimes picky.

I believe this will be an up & coming place to stay and will compete with many other hotels. A nice place to stay if you are not wanting to stay in a hostel.

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Solid, Large and Cleanβ€
content:
We've stayed in a lot of dodgy hotels for cheap, but this one was all round great.
We had the city view on the top floor (no elevator), which also had a partial view of the river.
The room was huge and had two opening windows. A big plus for those disliking airconditioning.

Perfect location too.
We were really satisfied with the price and quality of this room.

Although there aren't many mosquitos three floors up, fly screens would be my only suggestion.

content: Lovely across from The Riverfront Guesthouse. Very clean tile floors everywhere. Close to all about the Town and the River activities. Highly recommend. - only one thing: the Guesthouse staff booked a Phnom Penh International Airport Shuttle Bus Ticket For Me. Said 3 hours ride. However, the fact was β€a local busβ€ to stopped by so often everywhere to pick up local people and finally took almost 5 hrs. This is not supposed to happen to β€The Tourists Shuttle Busβ€, I think. Thanks!

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Its not bad, if youβ€™re not paying too much.β€
content: We stayed for a week. For the price we paid, $30/night, we were kind of expecting more (I.e. new sheets, towels toilet paper etc.). They did empty out trash because we left it outside of our room, but if we hadnβ€™t I donβ€™t know if it would have been emptied. We found out later that our rate was probably higher due to a local festival taking place during our stay. If youβ€™re not paying, at most, more than $15 a night and are only staying for a couple nights this place isnβ€™t bad. The ac and WiFi worked well and it was clean and quite, but still donβ€™t expect much in terms of service.
